# 6.0 Docs

> Documentation for 6.0 Docs.

- [Breaking change: Coerce call arguments according to ECMA-335](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/jit/6.0/coerce-call-arguments-ecma-335.md): Learn about the breaking change in .NET 6 where call arguments are coerced according to ECMA-335.
